title: Grade 7 Mathematics Mastery
subject: Mathematics
tagline: Building strong mathematical foundations - from basic operations to advanced concepts
description: Comprehensive curriculum covering all essential Grade 7 math concepts organized by term with progressive skill development and real-world problem solving.
feature_note: Each lesson includes concept videos, step-by-step examples, and tiered practice problems (foundational → advanced).

lessons.title: 1.1 Whole Numbers
lessons.description: This lesson covers fundamental operations with whole numbers including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. We'll explore place value systems and multi-digit operat

lessons.title: 1.2 Basic Operations
lessons.description: In this lesson, we'll learn about exponential notation and the laws of exponents. We'll explore how exponents are used in scientific applications and everyday mathematics.

lessons.title: 1.3 Multiples
lessons.description: In this lesson, we'll learn about exponential notation and the laws of exponents. We'll explore how exponents are used in scientific applications and everyday mathematics.

lessons.title: 1.4 Multiples of powers
lessons.description: In this lesson, we'll learn about exponential notation and the laws of exponents. We'll explore how exponents are used in scientific applications and everyday mathematics.

lessons.title: 1.5   Doubling and Halving
lessons.description: In this lesson, we'll learn about exponential notation and the laws of exponents. We'll explore how exponents are used in scientific applications and everyday mathematics.

lessons.title: 1.6 Rate and Ratio
lessons.description: In this lesson, we'll learn about exponential notation and the laws of exponents. We'll explore how exponents are used in scientific applications and everyday mathematics.

lessons.title: 3.1 Geometry of Straight Lines
lessons.description: This lesson explores the fundamental properties of straight lines, including line relationships, angle properties, and the characteristics of parallel and perpendicular lines.

lessons.title: 3.2 Construction of Geometric Figures
lessons.description: Learn the art of geometric construction using compass and straightedge tools. This lesson covers accurate constructions and the proper use of geometric tools.

lessons.title: 5.1 Geometry of 2D Shapes - Triangles
lessons.description: Triangles

lessons.title: 5.2 Geometry of 2D Shapes - Quadrilaterals
lessons.description: Quadrilaterals

lessons.title: 5.3 Geometry of 2D Shapes - Circle
lessons.description: Circle

lessons.title: 2.1 Common Fractions Mastery
lessons.description: Master the operations with common fractions including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. Learn about equivalent fractions and working with mixed numbers.

lessons.title: 2.2 Decimal Notation for Fractions
lessons.description: Learn to convert between fractions and decimals, perform decimal operations, and apply rounding strategies in real-world contexts.

lessons.title: 8.1 Relationships Between Variables
lessons.description: Explore how variables relate to each other through proportional thinking and rate problems. Understanding these relationships is fundamental to algebra.

lessons.title: 9.1 Perimeter & Area of 2D Shapes
lessons.description: Learn to calculate perimeter and area of various 2D shapes, including composite shapes and real-world applications.

lessons.title: 10.1 Surface Area & Volume of 3D Objects
lessons.description: Explore the calculation of surface area and volume for 3D objects including prisms, pyramids, and cylinders with real-world applications.

lessons.title: 11 Numeric & Geometric Patterns
lessons.description: Discover and analyze numeric and geometric patterns. Learn to identify pattern rules, extend sequences, and recognize visual patterns in mathematics.

lessons.title: 12 Functions & Relationships
lessons.description: Introduction to functions through input-output tables and function notation. Understand basic relationships between variables.

lessons.title: 13 Algebraic Expressions 1
lessons.description: Learn to work with algebraic expressions including variables, simplifying expressions, and combining like terms.

lessons.title: 14.1 Algebraic Equations 1
lessons.description: Introduction to solving algebraic equations using the balance method and verification techniques for one-step equations.

lessons.title: 15.1 Graphing & Coordinate Geometry
lessons.description: Learn to work with the coordinate plane, plot points accurately, and create line graphs to represent mathematical relationships.

lessons.title: 16.1 Transformation Geometry
lessons.description: Explore geometric transformations including translations, reflections, rotations, and symmetry concepts.

lessons.title: 17.1 Geometry of 3D Objects
lessons.description: Study the properties of 3D shapes, understand nets and faces, and develop spatial reasoning skills.

lessons.title: 18.1 Integers
lessons.description: Learn about positive and negative numbers, understand number line concepts, and apply integer operations in real-world contexts.

lessons.title: 19.1 Number Patterns
lessons.description: Explore complex number sequences, develop pattern recognition skills, and apply mathematical reasoning to identify and extend patterns.

lessons.title: 20.1 Functions & Relationships 2
lessons.description: Advance your understanding of functions with linear relationships, graphing techniques, and analysis of rate of change.

lessons.title: 21.1 Algebraic Expressions 2
lessons.description: Build on basic algebraic skills with advanced operations, distributive property applications, and introduction to factoring.

lessons.title: 22.1 Algebraic Equations 2
lessons.description: Solve multi-step equations, tackle word problems, and develop systematic problem-solving strategies.

lessons.title: 23.1 Collect, Organize & Summarize Data
lessons.description: Learn systematic approaches to data collection, organization techniques, and methods for summarizing datasets.

lessons.title: 24.1 Represent Data
lessons.description: Master the art of data visualization through various graphs and charts, learning to choose appropriate representations for different data types.

lessons.title: 25.1 Interpret, Analyze & Report Data
lessons.description: Develop skills in data interpretation, drawing valid conclusions, and communicating findings through clear reports.

lessons.title: 26.1 Introduction to Probability
lessons.description: Discover the fundamentals of probability including basic concepts, experimental versus theoretical probability, and simple probability calculations.

resources.title: Fraction & Decimal Calculator
resources.description: Interactive tool for fraction and decimal operations

resources.title: Algebra Foundations Lab
resources.description: Digital algebra manipulatives and problem solver

resources.title: Data Analysis Simulator
resources.description: Interactive data collection and graphing tools

teacher_resources.title: Complete Assessment Suite
teacher_resources.description: Chapter tests, quizzes, and rubrics for all units

teacher_resources.title: Differentiated Learning Plans
teacher_resources.description: Tiered activities for diverse learning needs

teacher_resources.title: Parent Communication Kit
teacher_resources.description: Home support materials and progress trackers

cta.title: Expert Grade 7 Math Support
cta.subtitle: Our qualified tutors provide personalized instruction tailored to Grade 7 standards
